name: Somewhere Over The Rainbow Custom Tutu
description:
The Somewhere Over The Rainbow Tutu is hand tied with double layers of 6 colors: red, shrimp (orange), lemon, kelly green, french blue, purple. You may substitute Royal blue for french blue for a true rainbow of colors.  This can also be done in a pastel rainbow, or a "bright" rainbow (hot pink instead of red, etc) I will add a coordinating ribbon for an extra touch of cuteness!!

Measure your little one's waist for the perfect fit or use my sizing chart bellow.
Please contact me with any questions.
All tutus are made using 100% (Made In The USA) Nylon Tulle which is flame retardant. 

Custom orders take up to 10 days to complete (add 2-3 days for shipping).  If you need your order sooner please contact me - rush fee may apply.


Size Chart:

0-6M 14" Length 6/7"
6-12 M 15" Length 8"
12-18M 16 1/2" Length 9"
12-24M 17" Length 10" (9" for bloomers)
2T-3T 18" Length 10"
3T-4T 19" Length 11"
4T      20 1/2" Length 12"

name: Custom Tutu - Your Choice Of 2 - 4 Colors
description:
Tutu's are a little girls best friend!!!  Whether it is for a birthday outfit, costume or a rainy day - your little girl will LOVE to wear her tutu.

With this purchase you are the designer!
Select two different colors of tulle and I will do the rest.  
Please contact me for a tulle color chart.

Our standard tutu is made at 18" and best fits a 2-4T.  For a true custom fit, please contact me with her waist measurements (belly button level).  I will make the tutu 1/2 inch smaller than your measurement to insure a snug fit.  The wasitband is made of non-roll high quality elastic and will stretch 4" allowing her to get lots of wear!!!

Custom orders take up to 10 days to complete (add 2-3 days for shipping).  If you need your order sooner please contact me - rush fee may apply.


All tutus are hand-tied with double layers of 100% USA tulle in my smoke and pet free studio.

Please contact me with any questions.

options.name: Custom Tutu Your Choice Of 2-4 Colors
